page.title: 15MUSHROOM FARM (CONT)
page.content: A fork-lift truck carryiny four crates at a time is used to move the crates about.The mushrooms take from three to six weeks to grow and they are cropped about three to four times.We went into one room where the mushrooms were just starting to grow.We could see the heads just peeping out of the earth.They were the size of pin heads. In another room the mushrooms were the size of dinner plates.The mushrooms are picked by hand every day and the stalks are thrown away as it is not economical to sell them.The mushrooms are sold to Spitalfields Market, wholesalers and Tesco's.
